alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 3:38PM AKST until February 24 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blizzard conditions occuring, with periods of freezing rain expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Snow accumulations of 4 inches, and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch are expected. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 PM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will combine with snow and blowing snow to cause blizzard conditions today. These conditions will continue into Thu. Periods of freezing rain will mix with the snow tonight and Thu. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
